message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great product that I think you'll love. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Could you consider offering it at $95?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob. I can do $110, but that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $110?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, could you possibly lower the price to $100? Thank you.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I can do $105, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $105?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I truly value your product, but I'm still looking to keep my expenses within my budget. Could you possibly lower the price to $100?
